reviews.text:
Honestly the food is superb, the noodles are amazing and the portions are quite big, definitely you will be full!! We ordered two bowls different noodles, one with spinach handmade because I prefer veg stuff and it was absolutely delicious. One do the best noodles I have ever had. The Murger is also enjoyable but just a bit dry, would be perfect with some sauce in the middle or to dip in.
Definitely recommend this place, amazing food and the service is good, our waiter was very nice and helpful. Dishes are also served quite quick!
Will be going there again soon!!

The ONLY good thing place was that XI‚ÄôAN Sunset. Service is decent.

However I think it‚Äôs just overpriced average food. The noodles are just super long and it gets really messy. My brand new shirt was completely totalled because of the noodles as it kept dropping every time I tried to eat it.

Not worth your money. Just average food.

Fresh ingredients, and handmade noodle. Diangdiang Noddle is a must! We tried a couple starters and one bun dish, (Xi'an style), and a noodle dish each. Everything is delicious and freshly made right in front of you. Highly recommended, and a hidden gem on this quiet street.

There I met the most beautiful Chinese waitress even if I never saw her face under the black face mask. The food was wonderful and traditional. But I cannot really focus on the food from her beauty. I thought thousands of times to ask her WeChat number but I was like a coward without enough confident to say that. If you can read my review, can you please give your Wechat number to me or anyone else can help me to ask and send me in private. I really don‚Äôt want to miss her

The food was pretty good, the portion sizes were huge, the cost was a little big but still alright. Overall would recommend this restaurant, just don‚Äôt buy a lot of food because the portions are bigüëç
